message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. This is a great deal considering its true value. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have a budget constraint and I'm not sure I can stretch to $14,000. Can you meet me at $10,000?

Bob, I understand you have a budget constraint, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000, which is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's split the difference and make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
